recipes.label: Hint: A Quieting Performance: Not Enough!
recipes.startdescription: There is something here, but I cannot quite reach it. If I could stage a performance with a stronger tie to Winter.

recipes.label: Perform a Show laced with the Intent of Winter
recipes.startdescription: These performances have two outcomes, I have been told. Some audience members weep silently, but many feel numb, as if their soul is smothered by the white weight of snow.
Now comes the time for me to channel this energy into whatever target I desire.

slots.label: Direction
slots.description: Now that my Intent is set, I have to set my Direction. What do I wish to affect?

recipes.label: Today We Mourn
recipes.startdescription:
Quiet the clocks, stops the gallows swinging
Shutter the windows, still the bells a-ringing
Today we mourn a king

Freeze the forests, break the waves to mirrors flat
Shroud the sky, veil the sun in pale regret
Today we mourn the oldest king

recipes.label: Today We Mourn
recipes.startdescription:
No more shall the forest rustle, no more shall the mountains quake
No more shall he set the reeds a shiver, no more plains shall rumble in his wake

Quell the usurpers rumble
Let not a single fall leave tumble
Today we mark a loss the world has had
For the thunderking is dead

recipes.label: Yuki to Ame
recipes.startdescription:
Snow hides bloodstained earth
Or spring showers rinse the soil
Both seasons cleanse me
